content.detailedDescription:
Tonight at 9:35 pm, may 25th 2010, i just witnessed almost the same object again in color and illumination. this time it was a dim white light traveling from a north to south line. when directly overhead the intensity of the light grew as bright as the iss does and then slowly dimmed out again as it was when i first started watching opposed the flash i saw with ther object from a few days ago. the total time of the visible object was around 30 seconds. i could see the extreme humidity outside was very thick and can only see 1 or 2 visible stars. after checking the iss flyovers of st.Louis, there are no orbital paths flying over here until june so it wasn't an iss flyover or a satellite, because satellites always give off a reddish hue due to the infrared light reflected back off the earth. again it was a bright white object started out as a dim light then in the middle of path grew extremely bright as the iss is and then slowly dimmed out with a speed about as fast as the iss flyovers are from what i can reference. there were no faa lights, just one solid white light, nothing blinking or flashing. no other planes in the sky before or after event. 
 following points answers: i went outside in my frontyard as i do all the time to smoke, don't smoke in my house, i always look up everytime at night at first i thought the dim light was a satellite for the first few seconds until the illumination grew extremely bright for about 6-10 seconds before slowly dimming out again. shuttle or iss doesn't seem to do this on the 10 flyovers i've seen. it's path was from almost due north to due south. i lost sight of the object after the light dimmed, but did not dim out was still visible but the humidity was very heavy here tonight in creve coeur (st.Louis county. (*one thing i can not account for this time is that possibly it may have been the usaf x37b)
content.summary: bright white light, dim to bright to dim in illumination

content.detailedDescription: On may 13, 2010, we were driving back from my sisters house who lives in selma. my mom was driving and i was in the passenger seat. we were driving north on mc call ave from selma and as we turned right on north ave towards sanger when i saw what i thought was a plane hovering in one place over a field about 500ft from north ave. it wasn't that high because i saw it out of the windshield. it caught my attention because it wasn't moving, it was just floating there. i told my mom to look at it but she could not turn her head and drive at the same time. i got my phone and i called my brother, jeffrey gonzalez, who is a investigator for mufon. i told him what i just saw and he said it was a plane because jeff said their is one landing at the airport and i told him no, it's not a plane so he told me he was going to get into his truck and drive in the direction so he could video tape the craft. i told him it was a triangle with like whits christmas lights all around it. i hung up the phone and a couple of minutes later he called me back. he was about to ask me in what direction was the craft heading then both our phone's got dissconnected. i thought it was wierd because i have a i-phone and it has never done that before. i noticed that i had all my bars for good reception. my phone rang again and it was jeff, he asked me what happened and i told him i don't know why our phoes went dead. then he asked me once again, which way was the craft going and as i was going to tell him, our phones went dead again. again, i had all my bars. the phone rang again but by that time i could not see the triangle anymore. i know i should have taken a picture but when you see something like that you freak out. here is a picture that i drew, i guess it was the same size as a military jet.
content.summary: I was the passenger in a car, saw triangle with lights all around it.

content.detailedDescription:
I have the event written in my schedule, which i couldn't lay my hand on quickly right now. just watched 'ufo hunters' on tv, and they talked about a 'boomerang-shaped ufo'. i had never heard anyone else describe what i saw before; so i thought i'd write this note.  at the time (next day) called a local director of a local observatory here, but he never called back!

it was a lunar eclipse, and clear evening.  my honey and i were in the hot tub, watching it.  i got tired of looking at the moon, so turned away to stare off into the night opposite. i was looking at one spot in the sky, when i noticed something was moving up there.  as i watched, an object that was 'boomerang-shaped' was going fast across the sky, and absolutely soundless.  it obscured the stars behind it as it moved from west to east, taking about 7 seconds at the most to cross the heavens.  i knew it was boomerang, not a triangle, because as the stars were revealed again, the space between the lines of the boomerang had stars immerge while the two bars of the object still obscured the stars.  it was incredible!  hard to judge distance or size without a reference.  it seems to be half the altitude a jetliner cruises, and at least three football fields long.  it was a boomerang shadow, cutting across the sky. 

it was a one in a million chance that i would have seen this; if my vision hadn't been perfectly still on one spot in the sky, and in exactly the right location, and if the sky hadn't been remarkably clear and dark, during a total lunar eclipse, i would never have seen it.  i shouted to don and pointed, but by the time he could adjust his eyes, it was gone.

oh, and it was a true 'shadow'.  no lights, no reflective quality (for something so large, particularly).  it was exactly the same dark value as the rest of the sky; it did not have any other quality for it to stand out.  again, it was the pattern of disappearing and reappearing stars that gave it away, showing its sillouette (sp).  

the direction was travelling west to east, with a bit of a north-west to south-east aspect; moving in a line across the sky. it vanished out of my line of sight with houses, etc., in the way.

my reaction was that i couldn't believe that i had actually seen an ufo!  i know what i saw, and will take a lie-detector on it.  things really are going on that we don't know about!  i was thinking how weird it was that the object i'd seen was not what other people usually talk about seeing; a disc or lights or triangle.  this was trying to be invisible, like it was reflecting exactly the color of the sky behind it.  cool.

i can't remember what evening that was; have it written down.  i wonder if anyone saw anything unusual during that spring eclipse, 2005?

thanks, (55 year old female)
content.summary: Dark boomerange shape obsured stars during lunar eclipse

content.detailedDescription: I noticed a bright light hovering in the sky about ten miles west of raymond n.H.On the 23 of may at about 10:00.The same light has returned for three consecutive nights! the light is very bright and changes colors! i even have some short video clips taken on a little digital camera the light is so bright that my little camera can clearly see it and record it in the sky!! i have witnessed very strange things in the sky.My whole life,but this is the first time ive ever reported it!! this is the real deal!! i wish i had a better camera cuz im sure it will be back tomarrow!!!Oh yeah it hangs around for a couple hours then slowly fades away.This isnt my first sighting so im convinced we are not alone!!!
content.summary: Watched same bright light in the sky for three days now!

content.detailedDescription: A friend of mine snapped a ufo orb unintentionally while taking a photo from her cellphone of the ocean view near the city of pacifica, ca.  this happened around 1pm.  she did not notice the object while taking the photo. she first noticed the glowing object after viewing the photograph so she didn't see the object in motion. i was not with her at the time but she sent me the photo the next day after noticing the glowing orb in the sky.  we thought maybe it was the moon but the moon didn't rise til around 3:30pm earliest and its definitely not the sun since its 1pm and she is taking the photo facing west.  the sun was above her to the left at that time. she checked her windshielf to make sure there were no bright spots or any type of spot that could make that glowing object in the sky and that was ok as well.  we don't think its a planet or star cause its not glittering but glowing.... here are the photos: one is the original and the other is altered as i increased the saturation of the photo. the third photo is a cropped, up close photo with the saturation increased.
content.summary: Ufo orb photographed unintentionally by photographer

content.detailedDescription: It was my birthday an i was excited about a gift i had been given. the gift was the rocket kit you could buy at walmart. my dad has always been estatic about building the rockets with me. we came up with the idea to launch them at night and attach glow sticks to them to watch them go up in the night. it was around 1am when me and my dad and a friend went out to to a field out in the country side. (where there was no lighting) we had  about 7 rockets we had built and attached the green glow sticks to. we launched about 4 of them when something strange appeared. as the 4th one launched it was hard to see the glow stick because of the fast movement but as the rocket came to the peek of its climax you could easy spot it (the rockets would arch due to the uneven weight caused by the glow sticks) as the rocket arched it seemed to land on something you could not see. as soon a the rocket seemed to come to a complet stop and hover in the air the object it had landed on had become visable and moveed very fast like if to shake off the rocket and as the rocket fell the odd metallic flat object seemed as if it was struck by lightning but made no sound and then it was unseen again. we where all struck dumb by seeing this, that non of us had an idea what it could have been. we never could fing the rocket that had landed on the object.
content.summary: Odd movement.

content.detailedDescription: I just got off work @ approx 6pm.  i stopped at a convenient store and proceeded home.  as i left the city limits and headed out a country road toward home, i glanced to my left out to an open field and noticed what i originally thought to be a helicopter searching for something with its spotlight.  i didn't pay much attention, but then my subconscious realized that there was no propeller noise, and i was close enough i should have heard it.  so then i looked back at it and noticed it was proceeding in my direction.  not fast paced, but more slow and deliberate.  it was very close to the ground, it only went higher to avoid trees and powerlines.  no higher than to clear the obstacles.  at this point i realized that i was about to run off the road into the ditch, so i hit my breaks and came to a complete stop in the road.  with the car stopped i continued to keep my full attention on the craft, not wanting to take my eyes off of it for one moment.  by the time it had approached my road to my left and at the ditch line on my left, i am parked at the right ditchline.  it was that close! and it was very low, just hovering above the ground.  the craft proceeded very slow and went vertically up just high enough to clear the power line to cross the street i was on.  as it proceeded across the street, it came to a complete stop almost directly over me.  it was just enough in front of me that if i crawled up in the dash i could look directly up at it.  it was very large craft, all one silver metallic color, it made no sound at all and created no wind.  the only light i noticed came from the bottom of the craft in the very center of the disc.  the light that emitted from the bottom was more like a laser light, not a flash light.  the light did not shine outward it came down like a beam.  the craft began to move on in the same direction crossing the street and lowering back down toward the ground after clearing the power lines.  i decided to follow it, so i turned right on a road i was not familiar with and continued it the craft direction.  however, this road came to an end and i had to lock up the brakes and stop my car.  i crawled out of the car through the passenger door as the driver door did not open and proceeded to walk up the hill that the craft lowered behind.  as i approached the half way point between the top of the hill and my car i noticed it was dusk and would be dark pretty quickly.  i must admit i was sort of chicken at this point not having the false sense of security the vehicle provided.  i was afraid to go over the hill an it turn dark on me not knowing what to expect on the other side of the hill.  so i decided to abort and go to my car and continue home. i am not sure of the exact date, but i do know it happened on a friday and i am pretty sure it was 1988.  also, i am not the only one to have sightings on this night, so you should be able to find record.  in fact, there were so many sightings that the government actually issued a response.  the government response was that it was a russian satelite that had fallen out of orbit.  i can assure you that this craft was not a sattelite falling out of orbit.  this craft was changing speeds, dodging trees and powerlines and stopped and proceeded again.  not consisted with something falling out of orbit.  i do not believe that i lost any time, however i do not remember checking times.  it didn't seem like i lost time.  i would love to be hypnotized to see what else could be remembered.  it truly was one of the most exilerating moments of my life.  i chickened out because i didn't want to be abducted and to my knowledge i was not.  i did not see anyone driving the craft or anyone outside the craft. all the same, it was pretty amazing!
content.summary: A disc shaped object which made no sound or created any wind approached me from approx 100 yards away.  proceeded to me and hovered directly over the front of my car for approx 10 -15 sec.  i could see it clearly by looking up through the front windshield

content.detailedDescription:
I have seen four raptor in the air, (may 21) told a few people and then two days later, another very large "night blimp?" i take dog out at 9:45 every night, and saw the first "night blimp" the next day i remember seeing the sasme thing. i have seen raptors in the air since then. at least one a day. i was not drinking, it was just something that appeared. i told a buddy of mine about it and i have a weird van parked across the street. it is a not communications company in my area. guy in the truck  said, and glared, it's the neighbors. they have had internet problems and cable since so have we? digital is cool, but we lose a bit of the non digital. it all started a few days ago... it is the same as mark lopinot's craft. i cannot speak of this to anyone (wife, maybe the dog), but  i will, heck if all the cops saw it, that's fine. it is the same craft, enormous delta wing , silent, moved northeast. moved low flying. dog , old, "felt it?" and ran to the deck. 

notification of the object: saw it. not behaving right in the night sky.
it actually went over the house, silent. but there was a weird "wave" can't explain it
i lost sight of the object as it cleared the trees, very low. 

i am freaked out by the apperence of, strange repair men. i am not nuts
content.summary: Not a ufo sort of

content.detailedDescription: I and my niece had been watching strange looking objects when we noticed one of them flying in our direction i decided to shine my laser light not at it but fairly close to it then it slowed down flew closer to us and then stopped. i somehow lost sight of it after shining the laser but my niece whom was behind me  was able to snap a picture of a v shaped object. i did not realize that she had this picture until recently.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Unidentified  v shaped object  hovers above  us

content.detailedDescription: While waiting to observe international space station (iss)and shuttle atlantis during the evening of may 14th, observed a dark, point like object at a great distance to the west-northwest. object was at altitude higher than cloud deck. object did not leave visible contrails. object appeared to move much more slowly than observed commercial aircraft. object did not reflect sunlight as did observed commercial aircraft. first sighted at approx 30 deg above horizon, appeared to move due west, poss. south west at slow rate of speed. object slowly faded from view approx 27 deg above horizon due to distance/ altitude.
content.summary: Dark, slow moving, high altitude object observed near sunset

content.detailedDescription:
while working as a semi trailer inspector in a large concrete trailer parking area behind the temple,tx wal mart distribution center. at approximately 3:00pm cst the area outside was pretty much deserted as most arrivals/departures happen morning and evenings. i was alone, caught up with paperwork, and had time to relax before the coming influx of vehicles started. hot summer afternoon, absolutely clear weather. having a cup of coffee, i strolled to the end of the open-air, covered inspection bay and leaned against one of the support pillars and just hung out. looking to the west i noticed a vehicle in the air, about 1200 to 1500 feet in altitude, and with nothing else in the area i gave it my full attention. this happened to look like what i assumed was a lighter-than-air ship, but that thought evaporated as i inspected it closely. this was no blimp, zeppelin, balloon, or any other type of human construction. 
  hold up. i'll say right now i am a veteran cavalry recon scout. i am trained to spot and correctly identify vehicles, equipment, aircraft, and personnel with as much detail as possible. 
  this object was silver,tubular with blunt, rounded ends fore and aft. from my point of view there were no openings, windows, panel lines. there were no markings whatsoever. it had no directional stabilizers, i.E. a tail or empennage. it had no motor pods or propellors. it made no sound. it was not affected by the light breeze nor did it 'porpoise' like a dirigible. it traveled on a straight course, in a generally north-to-south direction. its airspeed was somewhere around 50mph, possibly slower. total time in my field of vision, which in that area was unimpeded, was about 20 minutes. alongside this vehicle were two black "dots" maintaining formation as if escorting the silver object. they continued 'in a stately manner' until lost from sight.
  since i was at work i had no camera but seeing as how odd this sighting was i have the event firmly pictured in my mind and can draw/paint the event with exact detail(which is easy since there were no details to speak of)
content.summary: Clear hot summer day. no aircraft. viewed from approx. 1.5 kliks distance. height approx. 1200 ft. silver blunted cigar shape. movement slow, north to south orientation.

content.detailedDescription: Logging this report for a friend of mine who described seeing a huge black rectangular object in the ski while driving to work this morning on i 84 westbound heading from meridian id. to nampa id. the object moved rather slowly across the ski moving from north to south. my friend witnessed this object for a duration of 5 minutes and got a good look at the rectangular object that did not have wings. for a while the object appeared to be following a plane but th plane eventually took a different course and the object dissapeared behind the clouds shrtly after. this friend of mine is a trustworthy person who has been skeptical of the ufo phenomena but now has had a sighting of her own! i trust her word and the description i gave you is indeed acurate to what the witness saw. if you can identify this for us or if anyone else can report seeing something similar we would really apprecite it! thanks!
content.summary: Huge black retangular object spotted while driving west bound on i84.

content.detailedDescription: Object moves very slow and moves up and down.  has been seen for the last four nights south of hwy 161 - east of freeway.  it only last 35 minutes and moves behind the trees.
content.summary: Ufo of some kind.  black strip around the bottom with red light illuminating from the side.

content.detailedDescription: This long ship had windows and passed over crowley at high rate of speed. i observed the craft from my front lawn and was so shocked , i told my wife and son..I described the long-sausage shaped vehicle and made mention of the windows and the rate of the vehicle and the fact it was ultra-transparent and less than a hundred feet as it passed over the trees and going into downtown.The sighting was only for 15 seconds , but was very vivid and obvious it wasnt human and strange. the craft appeared to me and then went back to invisible and traveled along. thus, i make this report to your people to document and give some info. to your research. **note: this craft was in comparison to a mobile home flying along at at least 100 mph and then dissolved away as it flew by.It was about 6 pm and i usually watch the news at this time..But i was going to lock my car and looked above the tree line looking at the weather ..When the craft was seen flying along and i wasnt sure if the beings wanted me to see them . but obviously it was a blazen display of "being seen" and went un-noticed by everyone except me.I thought this all to impossible and then realized this was not at all normal and told my wife.It simply was slipping along and had huge windows and was quiet and transparent. i did not see any beings but saw the shape.Long,cyndrical,fast,and low(&) feet) and then vaporised away...I have never seen an airship suck as this...I am very observant of the sky because of my up-bringing and notice anything that flys along the sky.I have some starnge thoughts of this sighting because i did not know what the%$#@ it was or have never before seen anything like it before. i made note of the fact that this would be more than others could handle if they would have witnessed the same sighting....I felt transfixed and viewed the ship as if i were a camera or film-camera .As i went over the scene repeadetly in my mind, i realized this was very un-common and what i would say was  " sneaky,stealthy and impossible to view ,....But did!!I dont mess with fiction or presumtions because i have always sought "truth" and theoritically will not be a tale-bearer as this is not truth...But i have to reel from the sight non-the less.I regret i have no photograph to share but this is all i had. thank you, mike d. edwards-crowley,louisiana.70526(337)785-0171   i live in southern louisiana and have been in the bayou many times where others will not go...This area is prime for such starnge occurances as i realize the potential for sightings of this kind and have once before observed a stange craft in the bayou apperently "cooling-off' in the water. my hunting dog"hunter" went after the ship and then tured tail and ran away terrified and upset he did not bite the object.
content.summary: Long ship-windows-transparent-

content.detailedDescription:
5/24/2010
approx 2:45am at knapp st between ave. y and vorhees ave.Near ave. z and knapp st and the coney island canal.
large disk ufo . severe electrical distirbances . computers in area tripped out emp effect. coney island w.P.C.P. tripp out equipment and more. apparently, moving vechiles tripped out and 
area in sky blacked out,suspect, locals involved. apparently, computers at local dinner "el greco" not far away, management noticed.
please keep the matter confidential
please forward cms number to e-mail address for future up dates.
i am mufon f.I. #1038
number of witness unknown.
content.summary: Disc in area causing major electrical disturbances.

content.detailedDescription: Looking up at sky from university of washington campus, laying on back and enjoying the weather and noticed black object about 60 degrees above horizon moving east-s. east in a large s-pattern.  object was at lower altitude than cumulus clouds.  it appeared to accelerate as it approached 30 degrees above horizon. and became invisible a couple of times against blue sky.  initially thought it was a balloon, but edges were sharp and movements were those of a powered craft of some sort.  event lasted around 1 minute and weather was partly cloudy.
content.summary: Object with shape/proportions of rectangle/cylinder moving sideways

content.detailedDescription: At 11:29 i was outside smoking a cigarette when i noticed what appeared to be a meteor entering our atmosphere. it was moving from east to west. approx. 2 minutes after a star shaped object appered from the north moving at an extremly high speed at an altitude that was exceedingly higher than any commerical aircraft would fly. the star shaped object was in sight for approx 8-10 seconds until the object went black and disapeared approximately where the meteor entered the atmosphere. the sky was perfectly clear with no cloud cover.
content.summary: Star shaped moving at very high rate of speed at high altitude

content.detailedDescription:
Hi, 

i found these 4 large alien faces in the same photograph that world news said the womans figure was found. please, i beg of you to look at these photos. nobody is taking this serious. i do not understand why. this is definitive proof that aliens are real. this is a nasa photo taken by mars spirit rover!

i attatched the photos. the full photo can be found at http://photojournal.Jpl.Nasa.Gov/catalog/pia10216 for the 5mb size and the 133mb size so it is easy to enlarge to see the detail without any blur.

thank you,
scott c. waring -taipei/taiwan
author/teacher
 
for some reason, news declared that a woman figure was found in this photo, but they totally overlooked the male figure next to her and the possibility that a child may also exist, taken by mars spirit rover.

on january 3, 2008, nasa posted a photograph (pia10216, google it-same photo as the woman figure was found!) taken by the mars spirit rover on their web site that bloggers around the world began scanning over carefully in order to catch anything that nasa may have accidentally let slip through. to everyone���s amazement some anonymous person in asia did and posted it on the internet causing widespread excitement over the possibilities of life existing on mars. this led me to new discoveries of a male and a possible child figure near the female figure. i also found a statue like face (head only), in high detail of a reptilian looking skyward and wearing a crown with a jewel in it. i found a three carved faces in the side of the mountain of three unknown species, which can only be compared to mt. rushmore. this is published in both my novels dragons of asgard & ufo sightings of 2006-2009.
content.summary: I found these 4 large alien faces in the same photograph that world news said the womans figure was found. please, i beg of you to look at these photos. nobody is taking this serious. i do not understand why. this is definitive proof that aliens are real.

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of may 22, 2010 at approximately 10:30 p.M. i went outside to my backyard and sat down in my lawn chair to smoke a cigarette.  the back of my house faces the south.  i noticed two stars in the southern sky that seemed a little brighter than most of the other stars out that night.  after a moment it occured to me that i had never seen these stars before and when i realized this i noticed that they were moving.  at first i thought they might be aircraft or possibly satellites but i quickly discounted those possibilites because of the fast pace at which they were moving.  one of the craft followed at a consistant interval and they were traveling from due south to due north one behind the other.  when they passed a point that was just past overhead, they seemed to stop and accelerate away from the earth at a high rate of speed that caused their star-like appearance to fade away as the lights grew dim and they disappeared into space.
content.summary: Two star-like craft traverse the night sky at atypical speed

content.detailedDescription: My dog was out on the deck and started barking so i went out.  looked up in the sky (just about northwest) and saw a bright light - thought it was a plane but it didn't move.  so i thought it was just a bright star, but considering there's a 3/4 moon, this was pretty bright.  i watched for 3-5 minutes and it just stayed in one spot.  it seemd too big for a star but small of anything else, unless it was far away. went inside and about 20-30 min later went out again and it was gone.  been out for last 1 1/2 hours and nothing else.  just wanted to report it in case someone has seen anything.
content.summary: Bright light in nw sky - stationary - thought it was a bright star

content.detailedDescription:
In 7 nov 1990, i was 12 years old.  i was playing with a friend behind our house.  suddenly, appeared in the sky a magnificient oval ufo.  the colors were very pure and beautiful orange/red (with a little bit of yellow).
me and my friend were very amazed about what's going on in the sky and wondered what it is?
my father and uncle was also behind the house they were building the garage for the winter. my friend asked me to tell them to look in the sky, but i didn't do it, i was afraid to look crazy.
my mother came outside and i asked for a camera to take a picture, but none was available.

the ufo was slowly moving in the sky, and then disappeared and re-appeared behind his contrail. its stayed for a while and the disappeared behind a cloud.

after the event, i went inside and talked about that with my brother.  i drawed a picture of what i saw and described the event.  he tolds me that some ufo networks are looking for witness of ufo, but we have no clue where to report the ufo (sorry, didn't know mufon at the time!).

many years later, i read in the newspapers that the former canadian minister of defense (paul hellyer) said the ufo was real as planes over our heads and their technologies can solve the climate change and save the humanity!
then i considered ufo a very serious phenomena, i read a lot about it... the french cometa ufo report, disclosure project, radio-canada ufo files, canadian national ufo archives...

then i learned that the 7 nov 1990, there was a mass sighting of a ufo in montreal at place bonaventure.  thousands of people saw a orange ufo and it was reported by la presse, radio-canada... and years later many tv shows reported the event.
youtube ovni (ufo) place bonaventure or :
mass ufo sighting montreal reported in tv news
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=yfafydd8xbi&translated=1

it was a very beautifull event, i had no fear, i enjoyed the sight and stayed in my mind for many years...
content.summary: Very bright orange/red/yellow oval

content.detailedDescription: My friend was taking a pic. of a rainbow and he didnt even know it was there till i saw it it is in 2 pictures it looks like 4 circles in the shape of a dimond if u zoom in u can see it better it looks like 2 circles with a line in the middle. i have a picture but dont know who to give it to that will tell me what it is.
content.summary: 4 circles in the shape of dimond

content.detailedDescription: While driving north on i-95 from miami i made a quick stop in the st. agustine area flying j truck stop at exit 305, about 11 pm. soon after i returned to the highway, i noticed a bright blue light in the dark open sky. i kept sight of this blue star for about ten minutes, when suddently the blue star turn into a white glowing star, and in turn, started to move from west to east, kind of heading to the jacksonville area, towards the atlantic ocean at about 30 thousand miles to then turn south. it got all my attention when from this light, two huge circled flashes came off from it, as if it had entered into the atmosphere or changed from being a circled star light to a flying craft coming down really fast. after the entry from space, i only could see pulsating and turning lights of blue, red and green colors approaching very fast the area where i was heading. couldn't describe size or shape of object, but it flew along the highway around 5 thousand feet. the shadow above the lights was of about 100 to 200 feet long, no sound was emmited by the craft. i slowed down as much i could but i could not see where it went after i was by pass by it, because obviously i had to keep my sight in the road since i just kept driving. the night sky was clear, open and starry, no clouds, no noticiable air traffic in the area. when i first saw the blue star, never imagine that few minutes after watching it while driving, would turn into a bigger white star and move fast towards east. the most impressive was to see the emission of two huge circled flashes and then the white light dimmed to become a pack of shadow emmiting lights that started to fly right towards where i was heading. frankly, i have never experienced such thing before.
content.summary: Blue star turns into spacecraft.

content.detailedDescription:
Hello, it's 5/24/10 my name is [cms/tg/pid]. i'm 26 year's old with two little girls...

i don't really know who to tell my story to. 

i've had these strange sorts of events happening to me throughout my life. they were coupled with different feelings... confusion, fear, disbelief.

none of it really made sense until i saw in detail what i'm about to tell you. i knew that everything i had questioned before was no longer questionable. it was undisputed in my mind. it has been going on my entire life and now there is finally an event that proves (to me) that this is real.

i'll start by telling you that my cousin bud was with me when this happened... he has been in the navy now for about 8 years. he is a trustworthy person and his word means a lot to everyone that knows him. not only is it me telling the story, but he can verify that what i'm telling you is true. 

my cousin and myself were sitting on the back porch of my house (which was also my bedroom). it was my bedroom at the time because it was a room enclosed with glass walls. some of the sections of the glass had been removed and either had screens remaining or nothing left in them at all. since it was summer, this wasn't really a problem. i actually loved being in a room that allowed me to look outside at nature and even the stars.

we had a couch-bed in the room that was unfolded at the time. it was unfolded for most of the summer so that my cousin could sleep over and "hang out" with me. the backside of the couch-bed was placed against the glass, so the unfolded bed occupied the space in the room facing the house. 

we were laying in bed trying to sleep but we spent most of our time talking instead. then, out of the corner of my eye, i spotted a red glowing orb that came into view from behind the house and was slowly moving across the sky. *see attached photo*
i got bud's attention and we both watched the orb move across the treeline that was north of the trailer park. it seemed to not be as far away as a plane should be. it look to be about the size of a basketball approximately 50 yards away. i then realized that it was getting closer and that it clearly was not a plane. 

as it moved across the sky, we watched as this incredible ufo was slowly moving toward a treeline where we assumed it would disappear out of our lives forever.

but instead of disappearing into the sky... i could still see it through the trees moving towards the ground. i could clearly see it flickering through the trees and i would estimate it to be approximately 10 feet off of the ground as it entered the field on the left. it had clearly made a 90 degree turn. at this point in time i realized that it was probably in the field that was on the other side of the treeline. (treeline: small patch of woods separating the trailer park and a field.)
it traveled the length of the field before i could not see it through the trees anymore. i would estimate the length of the field to be about 200 yards.

my cousin and myself sat in awe even after we could not see the ufo anymore. he turned to me and said "let's go check it out!" i sternly answered with, "hell no! are you f**king crazy??" i was not sure what i had just seen but i had a gut feeling that i did not want to find out. so, we waited...
waited... two young boys waiting to see something else as amazing as what they had just witnessed.
then it happened...

a flash, as if someone had taken a picture from a camera, appeared at my friend serena's trailer. it was on the other side of her trailer, preventing me from seeing the source of the flash.
approximately two minutes later, another flash... this time, from the side of her trailer. i still couldn't clearly see the source of the flash.
at this point, my cousin and i were starting to think something strange was happening.
a few moments later, another flash. this time, i could clearly see the source of the flash... nothing. it appeared as if the flash was angled towards serena's house, although there was no source of the flash. there was absolutely nothing visible to the naked eye that created this obvious flash. bud and myself both knew that flashes that are that distinct do not come from nothing. 

we waited about five more minutes still staring out into the trailer court through my glass room. we were now more worried about what was in the court than what we had seen earlier. without speaking to each other for what seemed like five or ten minutes, another flash happened.
this time it was at my friend "t"'s house - directly in front of my house. the flash was on the other side of the trailer and appeared to be aimed at his mothers bedroom. again we waited... wondering what the flashes were.
another couple minutes had gone by. another flash.
this time, it was clearly pointed at "t"'s window and there was nothing at the source of the flash. in my mind i could pinpoint, to the inch, where the flash had started, yet there was nothing there. bud looked to me and said "what the hell are those flashes?" i had no reply. i wanted to remain silent and hidden from whatever had been making the flashes. 
again we waited.
about another five minutes passed when there was a flash on the other side of mr. wilson's house. (that wasn't his real name, but we knew him as mr. wilson in the trailer park.)
so, we waited what seemed like forever. in reality, it was probably 15 to 20 minutes with no sign of flashes or anything similar to them.
quite suddenly, bud looked at me and said "well, i'm getting tired. wake me if anything happens." he then put his head right down on his hands where he was sitting (propped up on his knees on the backside of the couch bed). 
i said, "okay" but wondered how anybody in their right mind could just fall asleep that fast after witnessing what we had witnessed. in my mind, i would not go to sleep until the sun was up and people were awake.
i started to get the strange feeling that the happening wasn't over. then... i started piecing things together that were quite simple and obvious.
1. serena lives with her mother and father. there were 3 flashes at her trailer. (aimed at their bedrooms...)
2. "t" lives with his mother. there were 2 flashes at his trailer. (aimed at their bedrooms, also...)
3. mr. wilson lives alone. there was one flash.

i figured that if they had gone through flashing every individual, as they went around from left to right in the court, since wilson was last they had to turn around and come up the other line of trailers...
starting with mine.
i almost panicked as i came to the realization of what i believed was true.
i turned my head in the direction of where i believed the thing causing the flash to be. as i turned my head i could clearly see out my window (one that did not have glass or screen in it - open - nothing obstructing my view) an alien. i had turned quick enough to spot him before i saw a flash come from, what seemed like, his forehead..........
when the flash hit me, he disappeared and i realized i was completely paralyzed. as i tried to move my limbs, i looked around to realize that i was no longer on the same part of my bed that i had been during the flash. i was, in fact, at the foot of my bed on my knees staring at the open window as if nothing had happened. instantly, the numbness was gone.
i grabbed the back of bud's leg (because he was in the same position that he had been in when he laid his head down...) 
it appeared that he had not moved at all. but somehow i was at least 4 feet away from where i was when i had seen the flash...? when i grabbed his leg i screamed extremely loud "bud! wake up!" his head came off of his hands with his eyes wide as if he knew something wasn't right.
we didn't have to say anything to each other as we both jumped up and ran into the kitchen. we each armed ourselves with butcher knives, not knowing how much time had gone by or if the threat was still around. he asked me what had happened. the only way i could really describe it to him was "i was flashed.." bud knew what i meant by that, which told me that i wasn't just seeing things and that i wasn't alone.
after about two minutes of silence.. waiting for something else to happen.. we finally laughed at the fact that we were standing armed in the kitchen with knives... waiting for aliens to come.
it seemed ridiculous to us.. although it had clearly just happened, we couldn't really wrap our minds around it. so, we laughed it off and this time we went to bed inside of the house, instead of the room surrounded with glass windows.

(this event has made me realize that more than one time in my life - for a split second - i have seen aliens and "the flash". i have seen them in my bedroom window... i have seen them outside of my tent while sleeping in the woods* the same woods that are between the trailer park and the field i described*... i have had many occasions where, just for a second, i believed that i had been part of an alien abduction. seeing what i have seen and the fact that i have witnessed a ufo, i have seen that ufo land in my field, i have seen something flash friends and neighbors, and i have been flashed by something that came from the sky... this is not your ordinary alien story because to this day i cannot say that i fully remember ever communicating with an alien or being aboard their "crafts". but that doesn't mean that i haven't seen, felt, or experienced something extremely out of the ordinary. my cousin was there as a witness to the ufo and to all six flashes... (the seventh, of course, being my own) i have no explanation as to what exactly the flashes are or what they do to people, but i do think that they were meant for individual people... and to somehow make a person "unaware" that something is going on... whether by putting them to sleep... paralyzing them... or wiping out their memory... i don't know for certain. what i do know for certain is that i have had many encounters with them and i believe that i truly know how they arrive. to put it bluntly, i've caught them in the act of flashing people. i believe that they were completely unaware that i had spotted them, until it was too late. i feel as though they knew that they had made a mistake. i had witnessed their mistake and i almost felt the reaction of the alien as.. panic. for the instant that i saw him, i knew in my gut that he was as scared of me as i was of him. i knew that their "routine" was not supposed to have been witnessed by anyone. we are supposed to be dazed by the flash when they come.)
content.summary: I saw a ufo in the sky.. move and land in the field behind my house about 1 hundred yards away.. then i saw an alien...No lie..

content.detailedDescription: Not a whole lot to say looking out my window towards the east focused on what appeared as a dot in the sky moving in a straight line then stopped hung around then continued final seconds did a figure 8 then vanished.
content.summary: A dot appearance moves unconventional

content.detailedDescription: While waiting in rush hour traffic, i took several photos of a recently built highrise building.  while reviewing the images several days later, i noticed a dark diamond shaped object in one of the photographs.  i didn't notice it at the time the photograph was taken.
content.summary: Dark diamond shaped object

content.detailedDescription: I was driving with 2 of my friends. al the sudden my friend that was in the back seat said " i think im looking at a ufo", then my other friend said " i've been looking at it for 2 minutes now! what is that?" i said where? where? where? i wanna see it. i finally seen it as i was swerving all over the road as i was looking for it. it was 3 lights in the shape of a triangle, simply not moving. they were just sitting in the sky. so i decided to race toward it after we were looking at it for about 5 minutes, and as soon as i turned down a road that went towards where the ufo was, it jetted off into the horizon,(after it wasnt moving for about 5 minutes).
content.summary: 3 lights that formed a triangle that was hovering

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were in front seat of car, with daughter in back seat.  we were heading east toward pioneer pies on i240 (about may ave) in oklahoma city at about 7:30 pm.  the skies were cloudy and various shades of gray, but still daylight.  will rogers airport is off to the west of us.  as i was looking at the clouds, i noticed in the eastern sky in front of us, a darkish gray rectangle flying low in the sky heading s then se.  i told my husband and daughter and they saw it also.  my  husband was driving.  it was a different color gray than the sky and looked solid.  it did not appear to be a kite because it traveled very smoothly along a line, horizontally.  we then had to park the car-(had to turn back to west to park) and lost sight of it for about a minute, but it had disappeared just before that).  once we got out of the car, we looked up and could see it again, but it was harder to see and higher in the sky.  at the same time, another plane was taking off. that plane's contrail was diagonal-up and much higher in the sky.  the rectangle had no contrail and we couldn't hear anything and it moved very slowly horizontally it appeared.  it faded from view as we went into the restaurant.  we did not see any lights on it nor was there any area in the middle that was darker or more dense, like an engine or cockpit area.  don't know if it was a biplane, but it looked solid all through.  not shiny.  we all thought it was strange.
content.summary: Dark gray rectangle low-flying over city toward se direction

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking my dog out for the evening to go potty.  i was just watching
the sky and i noticed this light it was very bright and did not move. i
thought it might be the evening star as it did not move.  it appeared at times to have flashing colored lights.  it was above the flight pattern for planes to land at  los angeles internation airport.

i called my husband and he watched it, then we got the binoculars out, but
could not get a clear enough pictures to identify what it was.  it did not appear to be a plane, helicopter or blimp.  we watched it for over
two hours it did not move during that time.

at that point we just went to bed.  i called the l a sheriff's dept.
they had no idea.  i tried contacting knx1070 could only get the traffic
department.  i sent an email to nbc no reponse.

there you go.
content.summary: Noticed about 7:30 watched for over 2 hours.

content.detailedDescription:
My first sighting occured around the first weekend of march.  it was approximately 12:30 pm.  i was sitting on my patio drinking my coffee and watching planes circle around my area. when i was watching one of the planes in the east i happened to notice two whiteish lights above it. the lights were in a pair, one on top of the other.  the bottom light was slightly lower than the top and to the right.  the lights then separated. one light then moved northwest and the other moved southwest. i lost track of the one moving southwest as it moved over and past my apartment building but i continued to watch the other. it moved for a minute or so then stopped.  i was staring at it trying to figure out what it was then i noticed what appeared to me as a star to the right of it.  i have never seen a star visible in the sky around noon so i called a friend to see if it is possible one would be visible around noon. i watched the light and star while i was on the phone for approximately 4 or 5 minutes, then the light moved off to the northeast.

i have been seeing these things for the last three months.  im always doing the same thing, having coffee on the patio and watching the planes.  it seems like they materialize in the sky when im watching planes and commercial jets fly over.  that's how i notice them.  they always appear in a pair and then they will separate.  one will move out of my sight while the other will move then stop.  i would estimate that they are above cloud level. i'm not sure if they are metalic or white lights.  as for their speed i would guess they move faster than commercial jets.  they appear to flatten out or change their shape when they move.  i lose track of them when fly over my building.

i have located a youtube video and sent it to one of your case managers, glen means.  it is an exact replica of my sightings.  the only difference is i dont see as many in one sighting and the time of day.
content.summary: Multiple day sightings of star like objects in sky beginning march 2010 to present.
